title: Functional requirement 1
text: If ATM is initialized with t dollars and parameters k,m,n are entered, then parameters are set.

title: Functional requirement 2
text: If no cash card is in the ATM, the system should display initial display.

title: Functional requirement 3
text: If the ATM is running out of money, no card should be accepted. An error message is displayed.

title: Functional requirement 4
text: The ATM checks if the entered card is valid. If not, it displays an error message and returns the card.

title: Functional requirement 5
text: If the cash card is valid, the ATM should read the serial number and bank code.

title: Functional requirement 6
text: The ATM should log the serial number retrieved from the cash card and then update the log file.

title: Functional requirement 7
text: The ATM verifies the user's password and bank code with the bank computer.

title: Functional requirement 8
text: Different negative answers from bank computer for authorization dialog.

title: Functional requirement 9
text: If password and serial number are valid, the authorization process is finished.

title: Functional requirement 10
text: If a card is entered more than three times at any ATM and the password is wrong each time, the ATM keeps the card and displays a message to call the bank.

title: Functional requirement 11
text: Successful authorization triggers money dispensing.

title: Functional requirement 12
text: Handle transaction restart when amount exceeds transaction policy.

title: Functional Requirement 13
text: ATM sets the transaction to initiated if the withdrawal sequence was successful.

title: Functional Requirement 14
text: If the transaction succeeds, the ATM dispenses money.

title: Functional requirement 15
text: If the money is dispensed, the amount is logged.

title: Functional requirement 16
text: If the transaction is not successful, an error message should be displayed and the card should be ejected.

title: Functional requirement 1
text: The bank computer checks if the bank code is valid. A bank code is valid if the cash card was issued by the bank.

title: Functional requirement 2
text: If it is not a valid bank code, the bank computer shall send a message to the ATM.

title: Functional requirement 3
text: The bank computer checks if the password is valid for a valid cash card.

title: Functional requirement 4
text: If the password is invalid, the bank computer sends a message to the ATM.

title: Functional requirement 5
text: If the cash card and the password are both valid, but there are problems with the account, the bank will send a message to the ATM.

title: Functional requirement 6
text: If it is a valid cash card, a valid password, and there are no problems with the account, the bank computer will send a message to the ATM indicating that everything is ok.

title: Functional requirement 7
text: After the request, the bank computer processes the transaction.

title: Functional requirement 8
text: The account is updated after the money is dispensed.

title: Functional requirement 9
text: Each bank has a limit k for each account regarding the amount of money available via cash card per day or month.

title: Functional requirement 10
text: The bank only provides security for their own computer and their own software.

title: Performance requirement 1
text: System shall set the error message for at least 30 seconds.

title: Performance Requirement 2
text: If there is no response from the bank computer after a request within 2 minutes the card is rejected with an error message.

title: Performance Requirement 3
text: The ATM dispenses money if and only if the withdrawal from the account is processed and accepted by the bank.

title: Performance Requirement 4
text: Each bank may be processing transactions from several ATMs at the same time.
